alert.note: Alert for Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:09PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BERKS...SOUTH CENTRAL LEHIGH...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...WEST CENTRAL BUCKS AND NORTH CENTRAL CHESTER COUNTIES... At 108 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Royersford, or 17 miles north of West Chester, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter size hail near Green Lane. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Pottstown, Perkasie, Souderton, Collegeville, Royersford, Trappe, East Greenville, Schwenksville, Bally, Green Lane, Spring Mount, Geryville, Gilbertsville, Cedarville, Skippack, Stowe, Telford, Sellersville, Boyertown and Pennsburg. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 31 and 42. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
